and you wanted to write a piece about loneliness or despair or depression you'd call call it something generic
like a nocturn or a Sonata pathetic in an opera you could have singers act out
emotional or political issues pretending to be someone from another era in a fancy
costume but Mana stopped all this roleplaying he wanted to evoke the real
contemporary world with all its actual suffering and joy without pretense he
told it how it was Mara took our worst fears and set them to music this may
